con:call.name: CreateCustomer
con:call.con:request:
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:def="http://soap.upskills.in/soap/default?services=customerCustomerRepositoryV1">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <def:customerCustomerRepositoryV1SaveRequest>\r <customer>\r <!--email should be unique for each request--> <email>sindhum11@gmail.com</email> <firstname>Sindhu</firstname> <lastname>M</lastname> <dob>1990-05-29</dob> <addresses> <item> <region> <!--enter valid region code--> <regionCode>KA</regionCode> <region>Karnataka</region> </region> <!--enter valid country id--> <countryId>IN</countryId> <street> <item>#55, 1 st Main Road</item> </street> <telephone>+91 9876543210</telephone> <postcode>560023</postcode> <city>Bengaluru</city> <firstname>John</firstname> <lastname>Doe</lastname> <defaultShipping>true</defaultShipping> <defaultBilling>true</defaultBilling> </item> </addresses> </customer>\r
</def:customerCustomerRepositoryV1SaveRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>
